<ce:section-title id="sectitle0040">Synthesis of compound [Cd(Htci)(biimpy)]<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf>
</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0035" view="all">In a 23 mL Teflon lined stainless steel container, Cd(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·4H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (0.2 mmol, 0.06 g), H<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>tci (0.034 g, 0.1 mmol) and biimpy (0.021 g, 0.1 mmol) were dissolved in 10 mL H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O, and then adjust the pH to 6.0 using 0.2 mL 1 mol/L NaOH solution. Then, the mixture was heated to 120 °C and held at this temperature for 72 h. After cooling slowly to the room temperature, yellow prism crystals were obtained in 38% yield. Anal. Calc. for <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> C<ce:inf loc="post">23</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">21</ce:inf>CdN<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">9</ce:inf>: C, 41.45; H, 3.15; N, 16.82. Found: C, 41.53; H, 3.12; N, 16.87. IR/cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>(KBr): 3412 (m), 1615 (s), 1592 (s), 1548 (s), 1516 (m), 1428 (m), 1367 (s), 1261 (m), 1227 (s), 1072 (w), 967 (m), 845 (m), 772 (w), 746 (w), 653 (w).</ce:para><ce:section-title id="sectitle0045">Synthesis of compound [Cd<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>(tci)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(biimpy)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>]<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf>
</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0040" view="all">The synthesis of compound <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> was similar to that of compound <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> with 0.4 mL 1 mol/L NaOH solution to adjust pH to 8.0. Yellow prism crystals were obtained in 42% yield. Anal. Calcd. (%) for <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> C<ce:inf loc="post">46</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">46</ce:inf>Cd<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">16</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">20</ce:inf>: C, 37.29; H, 3.11; N, 15.13. Found: C, 37.31; H, 3.08; N, 15.15. IR (KBr, cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3347 (m), 1618 (s), 1548 (m), 1516 (w), 1423 (m), 1395 (s), 1378 (m), 1254 (m), 1228(m), 1157 (w), 1072 (w), 986 (w), 825 (m), 658 (w).</ce:para>
clean_text:
Synthesis of compound [Cd(Htci)(biimpy)]n 

In a 23mL Teflon lined stainless steel container, Cd(NO3)2⋅4H2O (0.2mmol, 0.06g), H3tci (0.034g, 0.1mmol) and biimpy (0.021g, 0.1mmol) were dissolved in 10mLH2O, and then adjust the pH to 6.0 using 0.2mL 1mol/L NaOH solution. Then, the mixture was heated to 120°C and held at this temperature for 72h. After cooling slowly to the room temperature, yellow prism crystals were obtained in 38% yield. Anal. Calc. for 1 C23H21CdN8O9: C, 41.45; H, 3.15; N, 16.82. Found: C, 41.53; H, 3.12; N, 16.87. IR/cm-1(KBr): 3412 (m), 1615 (s), 1592 (s), 1548 (s), 1516 (m), 1428 (m), 1367 (s), 1261 (m), 1227 (s), 1072 (w), 967 (m), 845 (m), 772 (w), 746 (w), 653 (w).

Synthesis of compound [Cd3(tci)2(biimpy)2(H2O)2]n 

The synthesis of compound 2 was similar to that of compound 1 with 0.4mL 1mol/L NaOH solution to adjust pH to 8.0. Yellow prism crystals were obtained in 42% yield. Anal. Calcd. (%) for 2 C46H46Cd3N16O20: C, 37.29; H, 3.11; N, 15.13. Found: C, 37.31; H, 3.08; N, 15.15. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3347 (m), 1618 (s), 1548 (m), 1516 (w), 1423 (m), 1395 (s), 1378 (m), 1254 (m), 1228(m), 1157 (w), 1072 (w), 986 (w), 825 (m), 658 (w).
